scripts.clean: cd transformer-tsc && npm run clean && cd .. && cd common && npm run clean && cd .. && ttsc --build --clean &&  cd client && npm run clean && cd .. && cd server && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.build: cd transformer-tsc && npm run build && cd .. && cd common && npm run build && cd .. && ttsc --build --force  && cd client && npm run build && cd .. && cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.install: npm install --ignore-scripts && echo "<-- FIX: When npm install is typed from under the examples dir in a fresh cloned repo, it only wants to install its own packages (but still this prepublish script is triggerd, strangely) - so we force it to install the packages from all workspaces"
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build && cp LICENSE transformer-tsc && cp LICENSE readme.md common && cp LICENSE readme.md client && cp LICENSE readme.md server && cp LICENSE restfuncs-metapackage
scripts.publish:publish: npm run prepublish && npm publish --workspace transformer-tsc --workspace common --workspace server --workspace client --workspace restfuncs-metapackage
